pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimate Orientation of an Inertial Measurement Unit // Estimate the orientation of an inertial measurement unit (IMU) with a 3-axis accelerometer and a 3-axis gyroscope using a complementary filter. 'imuf' takes an IMU's accelerometer and gyroscope readings, time duration, its initial orientation, and a gain factor as inputs, and returns an estimate of the IMU's final orientation.
